study.saved: Study with RDC-ID {{ id }} was saved successfully!
study.not-saved: Study with RDC-ID {{ id }} has not been saved!
study.missing-id: Study {{ index }} does not contain a RDC-ID and has not been saved:
study.upload-terminated: Finished upload of {{ total }} Studies with {{ errors }} errors.

id.not-empty: The RDC-ID of the Study must not be empty!
id.size: The max length of the RDC-ID is 128 signs.
id.pattern: Use only alphanumeric signs, german umlauts, ÃŸ and space, underscore and minus for the RDC-ID.

title.not-null: The title of the study must not be empty!
title.i18n-string-size: The max length of the study title is 128.
title.i18n-string-not-empty: The title of the study must not be empty at least for one language.

description.not-null: The description of the study must not be empty!
description.i18n-string-size: The max length of the study description is 2048.
description.i18n-string-not-empty: The description of the study must not be empty at least for one language.

institution.not-null: The institution of the study must not be empty!
institution.i18n-string-size: The max length of the institution is 32.
institution.i18n-string-not-empty: The institution of the study must not be empty at least for one language.

sponsor.i18n-string-size: The max length of the sponsor of the study is 128.

citation-hint.i18n-string-size: The max length of the citation hint of the study is 128.

authors.i18n-string-size: The max length of the authors of the study is 128.

survey-series.i18n-string-size: The max length of the survey series is 128 signs.

access-ways.not-empty: The list of access ways of a variable needs min. one element and must not be empty!
access-ways.validAccessWays: The values of access ways are invalid. Valid values are: suf, cuf and remote.

version.not-empty: The version of a release must not be empty!
version.size: The max length of the version is 32 signs.
version.pattern: Use only numbers and the dot for the version.

doi.size: The max length of the doi is 128 signs.

date.not-null: The date of a Release must not be empty!

notes.size: The max length of the version is 2048 signs.

post-validation.study-has-invalid-survey-id: The study {{id}} references to an unknown Survey ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
post-validation.study-has-invalid-data-set-id: The study {{id}} references to an unknown Data Set ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
post-validation.study-has-invalid-instrument-id: The study {{id}} references to an unknown Instrument ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
